brushing.description: Dean uses toothpaste; Felix prefers au naturel.
brushing.title: Brushing

gym1.description: We found an actual baby gymnasium in Noe Valley.  It's a cavernous space filled with baby and toddler play equipment.  Unlike Gymboree, this one is city-run and free.  All the cool kids go here.  We even met another Felix!
gym1.title: Gym 1

gym2.description: If there is such a thing as a "native habitat" for toddlers, this is it.  This is where the toddlers roam.  Stay tuned for the National Geographic special.
gym2.title: Gym 2

stairs1.description: The boy can climb.  He's mastered these stairs.  At houses with long flights of carpeted stairs, he zooms right up (but not yet back down).
stairs1.title: Stairs 1

stairs2.description: Once he can swing a knee up, he's off to the races.
stairs2.title: Stairs 2

zoo1.description: The San Francisco zoo has cuddly elephants.
zoo1.title: Zoo 1

zoo2.description: After overcoming some initial sheepishness, Felix had a blast at the petting zoo.
zoo2.title: Zoo 2

zoo4.description: The keeper said this was a special "karaoke alpaca".  He didn't elaborate.
zoo4.title: Zoo 4

zoo5.description: Notice that Lucie is making a "duck" sign with her hand.  We're trying to get Felix to understand baby sign language.  Don't laugh, it's big in san Francisco.
zoo5.title: Zoo 5

zoo6.description: Notice that Lucie is making a "tounge" gesture. This is French for "this baby's getting strong!"
zoo6.title: Zoo 6

zoo7.description: What mammal carries its young on their necks?
zoo7.title: Zoo 7

description:
Felix is developing a great personality. He's no longer so focused on mom. He's intensely interested in people. He's very inquisitive. He's a smile and giggle machine. He usually doesn't cry when he falls. Simply put, he is the best baby ever.

Favorite pastimes include climbing (especially scaling Mt. Lucie and Mt. Dean), hanging out at the playground, and family dinnertimes.

Felix turned 9 months old. Weight: 23 lbs 11 oz (10.7 kg). Height: 29.5 inches (75 cm). That's the same height as three weeks ago (when he went to the doctor because he was sick), but a weight gain of almost 2 pounds. He's been a world-class eater. Much to Grandma Harriet's chagrin, he hasn't had mashed potatoes and gravy yet, but that day isn't far off.
title: September 15
